controller.title: Data Controller Information
controller.content: KidBook Creator Ltd. ('we', 'us', 'our') is the data controller responsible for your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.introduction: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our Service.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Information that identifies you as an individual

photos.title: Photos and Images
photos.description: Images you upload for character personalization
examples: Photos used only for illustration creation

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.description: Information collected automatically when you use our Service
examples: Browser type, operating system, and device data
Pages visited and time spent on pages

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: Information about how you use our Service

required.title: Required vs. Optional Data
required.content: Some information is required to provide our Service (name, email for account creation), while other information is optional (additional photos, survey responses). We will specify what is required during the collection process.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.introduction: We only process your personal data when we have a valid legal basis under applicable law.

contract.title: Performance of Contract
contract.content: We process data necessary to fulfill our contractual obligations, such as processing orders, delivering books, and providing customer service.

interest.title: Legitimate Interest
interest.content: We process data when we have a legitimate interest, such as improving our Service, preventing fraud, ensuring security, and analyzing usage patterns.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: We process data based on your explicit consent, such as for marketing communications, non-essential cookies, and newsletter subscriptions.

legal.title: Legal Obligation
legal.content: We process data to comply with legal requirements, such as tax record keeping (7 years) and responding to legal requests.

purpose.title: How We Use Your Data
purpose.introduction: We use your personal data for specific purposes explained in this section.

purposes.title: Service Provision
purposes.description: Process orders, generate personalized books, and deliver products

purposes.title: Customer Service
purposes.description: Respond to inquiries, resolve issues, and provide support

purposes.title: Service Improvement
purposes.description: Analyze usage patterns, optimize features, and develop new functionality

purposes.title: Security and Fraud Prevention
purposes.description: Detect and prevent fraudulent activities, ensure platform security

purposes.title: Marketing Communications
purposes.description: Send promotional content (with your consent only)

purposes.title: Legal Compliance
purposes.description: Comply with laws, maintain records, and respond to legal requests

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing & Third Parties
dataSharing.introduction: We share your data only with trusted third parties necessary to provide our Service.

processors.title: Data Processors
processors.description: Companies that process data on our behalf

partners.title: Service Partners
partners.description: Companies that help us deliver our Service

safeguards.title: Data Protection Safeguards
safeguards.content: All third parties sign Data Processing Agreements and are contractually bound to protect your data. We only share the minimum data necessary for each service.

noSale.title: We Do Not Sell Your Data
noSale.content: We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.introduction: We retain your data only as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy.

account.title: Account Data
account.retention: While your account is active, plus 90 days after deletion

photos.title: Uploaded Photos
photos.retention: 90 days after order completion, then automatically deleted

automatic.title: Automatic Deletion
automatic.content: We implement automatic deletion processes for photos and temporary data. You can also request early deletion of your data.

userRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA)
userRights.introduction: You have specific rights regarding your personal data.

rights.title: Right to Access
rights.description: Request a copy of your personal data

rights.title: Right to Erasure
rights.description: Request deletion of your personal data (with legal exceptions)

rights.title: Right to Restriction
rights.description: Limit how we process your data

rights.title: Right to Data Portability
rights.description: Receive your data in structured, machine-readable format

rights.title: Right to Object
rights.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interest or for marketing

rights.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
rights.description: Withdraw consent at any time (doesn't affect prior processing)

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.content: To exercise these rights, email us at privacy@kidbookcreator.com. We respond within 30 days (may extend to 90 days for complex requests). We may verify your identity before processing requests.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.introduction: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site

consent.title: Cookie Consent
consent.content: We ask for your consent before placing non-essential cookies. You can manage preferences through our cookie banner or browser settings.

security.title: Security Measures
security.introduction: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures.

technical.title: Technical Measures
measures: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
Secure servers with regular security updates
Regular security audits and penetration testing

disclaimer.title: No Absolute Guarantee
disclaimer.content: While we take reasonable measures to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We will notify you of data breaches that pose a risk to your rights.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.introduction: Our Service is designed for adults to create books for children.

ageRestriction.title: Age Requirements
ageRestriction.content: You must be at least 16 years old (or 13 in the United States) to create an account. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under these ages.

parentalRights.title: Parental Rights
parentalRights.content: If you believe we have collected information from a child under the required age, please contact us immediately. We will delete the information promptly. Parents can request deletion of their child's data at any time.

childrenData.title: Children's Information
childrenData.content: We may collect information about children (names, photos) only when provided by their parents or legal guardians. This information is used solely for creating personalized books and is not used for other purposes.

aiPrivacy.title: AI & Photo Usage
aiPrivacy.introduction: We use AI to generate personalized illustrations from your photos.

photoProcessing.title: Photo Processing
photoProcessing.content: Photos you upload are analyzed by AI systems to create character illustrations. Photos are used only for this purpose and not for training AI models or other purposes.

retention.title: Photo Retention
retention.content: Photos are stored for 90 days after order completion, then automatically deleted. You can request early deletion at any time.

sharing.title: AI Provider Sharing
sharing.content: Photos may be shared with AI service providers under strict Data Processing Agreements. These providers are prohibited from using photos for any purpose other than generating your illustrations.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You confirm that you have the right to upload photos and have consent from all individuals depicted. For children's photos, you confirm you are their parent or legal guardian.

international.title: International Data Transfers
international.introduction: We may transfer your data to countries outside your home country.

transfers.title: Transfer Mechanisms
transfers.content: When we transfer data outside the European Economic Area, we use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission. These ensure your data remains protected.

marketing.title: Marketing Communications
marketing.introduction: We may send you marketing communications with your consent.

consent.title: Consent Required
consent.content: We only send promotional emails, newsletters, and marketing messages with your explicit consent. You can withdraw consent at any time.

optOut.title: Opt-Out Options
optOut.content: You can opt out of marketing communications by clicking the unsubscribe link in emails, updating your account preferences, or contacting us directly.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.introduction: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.

changes.title: Notification of Changes
changes.content: For significant changes, we will notify you by email or prominent website notice. Minor changes will be effective immediately upon posting. The 'Last updated' date indicates when this policy was last modified.

review.title: Regular Review
review.content: We review this policy regularly to ensure it remains accurate and compliant with applicable laws. We encourage you to review it periodically.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.introduction: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your rights, please contact us:

details.response: We will respond to privacy inquiries within 30 days.

authorities.title: Data Protection Authorities
authorities.content: If you have concerns about how we handle your data, you also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
